keywords: ['tribal fusion song', 'dance song', 'male voices', 'female voice', 'dance beat', 'programmed percussion', 'bass', 'traditional instruments', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This tribal fusion song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a dance beat using traditional tribal percussion instruments. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. At the end of the clip, a female voice sings a line. The theme of the song is an African dance. This song can be played in a club.
